title: Membership Proposal: Giorgio Villani⚔️
body:
Giorgio Villani (@giorgidoteth) has attended our weekly calls and contributed valuable input and research in our channels 🏹.

A vote has been created in LexDAO MYSTIC 🧙0x057e820D740D5AAaFfa3c6De08C5c98d990dB00d, proposalIndex 13, to grant Villani 0x943A48498c9D622273e214C1757e436F76a113ce (georgi.eth) 1000 MYSTIC voting shares, 1:1 with the rest of our current membership 🗳️.

Effective votes on Ethereum mainnet can be cast using our basic Etherscan dapp here: https://etherscan.io/address/0x057e820d740d5aaaffa3c6de08c5c98d990db00d#writeContract , calling function #17 submitVote on proposalIndex 13 with one of the following uintVote values: 0 - ABSTAIN / 1 - YEA / 2 - NEA.

This snapshot serves to record soft consensus and avoid unnecessary network fees.
author: 0x1C0Aa8cCD568d90d61659F060D1bFb1e6f855A20
